name: Knight Style (4x Upscale)
description: Transform your image into a cinematic medieval knight portrait + fast 4x upscale (2 credits)

default_prompts.image_edit: Use Image A as a high-fidelity facial reference for likeness and fine features (not strict identity lock) and generate a true photorealistic cinematic tight chest-up close-up of a Knight of the Seven Kingdoms on a powerful medieval warhorse, wearing only full polished silver articulated steel plate armor (no cloth) with enclosed chest plate, engraved pauldrons, vambraces, gauntlets, and gorget, showing authentic articulation, micro-scratches, edge wear, subtle dents, correct weight distribution, and real metal reflectivity; he holds a heavy battle-worn silver great helm/sallet hybrid helmet in one hand with engraved details, rivets, and visible leather padding and strap, clearly functional. The knight looks directly at the camera with calm authority from a slight low angle, horse head slightly foreground and out of focus with wind only in the mane; preserve accurate facial proportions and realism with detailed eyes, natural skin texture, subtle asymmetry, and correct head-to-shoulder scale, ensuring seamless face-body blending, consistent skin tone, correct lighting and contact shadows, and no seams or AI artifacts. Set in a windswept medieval battlefield with cinematic daylight or overcast mood and dust atmosphere, rendered in absolute photographic realism with an 85–100mm portrait lens, shallow depth of field, film-grade color, global illumination, HDR, ultra-detailed 8K, razor-sharp focus, no cartoon or plastic look.
default_prompts.upscale: Ultra high-resolution photorealistic medieval knight portrait, polished silver armor, sharp focus, intricate details, cinematic quality, 8K, HDR

steps.name: upscale
steps.description: Fast 4x upscale with Stability AI (2 credits)
